Title: 6 A.M.
Writer: Matthew Miller (created by), Dean Carpentier, Dean Carpentier, Matt Kester
Actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Alana De La Garza, Joel David Moore, Donnie Keshawarz
Plot: A man dies when his car catches fires and incinerates him. The various suspects center around the world of Jazz and concerns the true author of one of its greatest standards.
